MajorClaims.MC1: we should preserve historic buildings in the city

Claims.C2: they can develop tourism industries by attracting tourists
Claims.C3: They can benefit us financially by developing other industries

Claims.C5: Historic buildings answer many questions, which are mysterious about our previous ancestors; thereby no one can determine the price of the historic buildings

Premises.P3: They show us how they survive, or how they defend themselves etc
